main.name: Vincent Chau
main.description: My career interests include Virtual/Augmented Reality, Computer Vision, and Mobile Android/iOS Development
main.bio: My name is Vincent, a Mathematics - Computer Science Grad from UCSD and currently working at Motorola Solutions as a Systems Engineer - System Design and Implementation. I am constantly looking to challenge myself and learn new technologies every day - I hope to transition to software where I can develop and create meaningfully.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Mathematics - Computer Science

work.title: Systems Engineer
work.description: Deployed radio telecommunication systems for various Californian public safety institutions including City of Hemet Police Department, City of Redding, and San Jose Fire Department

projects.title: Virtual Reality Cell Visualizer
projects.category: Interact with 3D-modeled cell in Virtual Reality space

projects.title: Map-Based Journal
projects.category: Make a journal entry based on a pinpointed geographical location

projects.title: Twitch.tv Drawing Extension
projects.category: Draw pictures and display them on a twitch stream's chatroom

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
